mapper.sql: sr.id, sr.category_code, sr.category_name, sr.resource_code, sr.resource_name, sr.request_action_url, sr.sort, sr.remark, sr.data_status, sr.gmt_create, sr.gmt_modify
mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource(id, category_code, category_name, resource_code, resource_name, request_action_url, sort, remark, data_status, gmt_create, gmt_modify) values (#{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{categoryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{requestActionUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dataStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

(#{item.id, jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.categoryCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.categoryName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.resourceName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.requestActionUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sort, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dataStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.gmtCreate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.gmtModify, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update:
update sys_resource
category_code = #{categoryCode},
category_name = #{categoryName},
resource_code = #{resourceCode},
resource_name = #{resourceName},
request_action_url = #{requestActionUrl},
sort = #{sort},
remark = #{remark},
data_status = #{dataStatus},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify},
where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.delete: delete from sys_resource where id = #{id, jdbcType=BIGINT}
